sentences.en: He enjoyed his moments of solitude before the pressures of the day began.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢在白天的压力到来之前享受独处的时光。

sentences.en: He passed twenty - four years in solitude.
sentences.cn: 他在孤独中度过了二十四年.

sentences.en: I crept away, and courted solitude for the rest of the day.
sentences.cn: 我偷偷地走开了, 把那天余下的工夫都消磨在孤寂之中.

sentences.en: Imagine long golden beaches where you can wander in solitude.
sentences.cn: 想象一下那长长的金色海滩吧，在那里你可以独自徜徉。

sentences.en: Ivar found contentment in the solitude he had sought out for himself.
sentences.cn: 伊瓦尔在他自个儿寻找到这个荒无人迹的地方,颇觉得自得其乐.

sentences.en: People need a chance to re - flect on spiritual matters in solitude.
sentences.cn: 人们需要独处的机会来反思精神上的事情.

sentences.en: People need a chance to reflect on spiritual matters in solitude.
sentences.cn: 人们需要独处的机会来反思精神上的事情。

sentences.en: Perhaps it is the desire for solitude or the chance of making an unexpected discovery that lures men down to the depths of the earth.
sentences.cn: 可能正是寻觅幽静的去处,或者找个猎奇的机会的欲望引诱着人们进入地球的深处.

sentences.en: She longed for peace and solitude.
sentences.cn: 她渴望安宁，渴望独享清静。

sentences.en: She temporarily lost her balance during the long months of solitude.
sentences.cn: 在与外界隔绝的漫长岁月中,她一度失去心态的平衡.

sentences.en: Solitude is delicious balm to my heart in this heavenly spot.
sentences.cn: 在这样神圣的地方,对我的心来说,幽静是珍贵的安慰.

sentences.en: Solitude was no excuse for sloppiness.
The motif of these volumes is that 'solitude is the richness of the soul, loneliness is its poverty.'
sentences.cn: 这几卷的主题是“孤独是灵魂的财富，寂寞是灵魂的贫瘠”。

sentences.cn: 她湖边那所房子的清静

sentences.en: The subject was one that demanded solitude and a friendly discussion.
sentences.cn: 要讲的事情是需要一种私下单独的友好谈话.
